channel.title: kafka on menziess blog
channel.description: Recent content in kafka on menziess blog

item.title: Use Snapstream
item.description: One of the more challenging aspects I encountered while working with stream processing was the task of performing near-merge or as-of joins on Kafka streams.

item.title: Manage Kafka Streams
item.description: Processing messages from Kafka is relatively easy, but common errors can easily be avoided by having a better understanding of how Kafka works internally. We’ll process messages from the start of the topic, and see how Kafka handles offsets step by step.
